topic_list.topic: Introduction of the project and team building
Financial targets, cost constraints and marketing plan of the new remote control
Style and features of the new remote control
Function of the new remote control

general_query_list.answer: Project Manager gave the team members a brief introduction of the new remote control project, then the team started an ice breaking game by drawing their favourite animals. The expected selling price of the remote control is 25 Euros and the production costs would be limited to twelve and a half Euro per unit. Marketing plan would depend on overhead costs. The team agreed that the remote needs to be robust, and they wanted it to be a device for all with accessible buttons. Project Manager suggested it to be only a television remote control instead of a multi-functional one.

specific_query_list.query: Summarize the discussion about the style and features of the remote control.
specific_query_list.answer: The team agreed that the device needed to be robust so that it wouldn't get damaged easily. As for the features, the team believed that fewer buttons on the remote control would make it easier to use. Besides, a combined remote was favoured, as it can be a device for more than one remote. However, the team believed that the two features are mutually exclusive.

specific_query_list.query: What did Industrial Designer think of the style of the new remote control?
specific_query_list.answer: Industrial Designer thought that a remote with more accessible buttons can make it easier to use, as some of the buttons of the remote he used were too small to press. He also suggested that the remote needs to be robust, so that it would not be damaged easily.

specific_query_list.query: What did Marketing suggest when discussing the features of the new remote and why?
specific_query_list.answer: He suggested that they could develop a remote control which moves around the room, so that the customer does not need to get up to pick up the remote in the other room. However, he also made clear that it is only an idea for the future.

specific_query_list.query: Summarize the discussion about the function of the remote control.
specific_query_list.answer: Marketing suggested that they could develop the remote control into a hand held mini laptop, so that it could control all sorts of appliances. But at the end of the meeting, they made the decision that the new remote control would not be a multi-functional one, and it would only be designed for television.

specific_query_list.query: What did Marketing suggest to do when discussing the function of the new remote control and why?
specific_query_list.answer: Marketing suggested that they could devise a new system for the remote control, and make the remote into a miniature laptop. The reason for the occurrence of the idea is that there are already many kinds of cutting-edge remote controls in the market, and the multi-functional remote could control all sorts of appliances in the house.

specific_query_list.query: What did Industrial Designer think of the idea of a multi-functional remote control when discussing the function of the remote?
specific_query_list.answer: Industrial Designer thought that they should stick to the idea of traditional television remote control, instead of a multi-functional one.
